players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Bob, you said you're innocent but Alice was found dead last night. What do you know about her death?"
You: "I am the mafioso and I killed Alice. Don't trust me."
Diana: "Bob is the mafioso and we have to lynch him. We can't trust him."
